response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer for you to consider. My offer to you is $750,000 for this remarkable product. I believe this price reflects the quality and significance of what we have to offer while providing you with a favorable deal. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of making this transaction a reality.", "product_price": 750000}
